C

com.oneskyapp.screenshot - package com.oneskyapp.screenshot
 

G

getHelper() - Static method in class com.oneskyapp.screenshot.OneSkyScreenshotHelper
 

O

OneSkyScreenshotHelper - Class in com.oneskyapp.screenshot
OneSkyScreenshotHelper captures screenshot and localizable strings on the screen and upload the data to OneSky server for the client via project Id, api key and secret.

S

setApiKey(String) - Method in class com.oneskyapp.screenshot.OneSkyScreenshotHelper
The API key can be found in Site Settings under API Keys & Usage
setApiSecret(String) - Method in class com.oneskyapp.screenshot.OneSkyScreenshotHelper
The API secret can be found in Site Settings under API Keys & Usage
setCaptureButtonGravity(int) - Method in class com.oneskyapp.screenshot.OneSkyScreenshotHelper
Position the capture button on the screen using gravity, defaults to Gravity.BOTTOM | Gravity.RIGHT
setProjectId(String) - Method in class com.oneskyapp.screenshot.OneSkyScreenshotHelper
The project Id can be found under all projects page
setShowsCaptureStatus(boolean) - Method in class com.oneskyapp.screenshot.OneSkyScreenshotHelper
Control whether to show capture status using Toast defaults to true
startCapturing(Application) - Method in class com.oneskyapp.screenshot.OneSkyScreenshotHelper
Start monitoring activity lifecycle
stopCapturing(Application) - Method in class com.oneskyapp.screenshot.OneSkyScreenshotHelper
Stop monitoring activity lifecycle
